featured.text: The researchers therefore had to study a lot of cows grazing in lots of different places at different times of day, in order to average out these factors and see whether cattle could act like compass needles.
Herds of goats and cows 26 enormous horns graze the lush green fields.

definition.zh_def: 輕輕擦過或觸碰，通常指動物在草地上吃草。
definition.en_def: To feed on growing grass or other vegetation; to touch lightly in passing.
definition.example: The cows graze peacefully in the meadow.
